column5: Gonna be another sizzler  but it sure beats shoveling snow in February.  Have a goodun everybody

A happy day to you too Lew  Off to work for me this A:M. Did get out fishing yesterday though, what a scorcher! Then came home and put the window AC units in so we would be able to sleep in comfort. Finally sat down at 'bout 7:00 and the pain in my knee reminded me that I forgot   to go to a doctor appointment for a follow up on it and prob another cortisone shot.  Enjoy the sunshine  today everyone.
88 yesterday and again today.   Wishin' I had put in the AC units yesterday.   Definitely on the list when I get back from work late this afternoon.  Little taste of what's to come ?
Fortunately I've got central air in the new place but I looked at my wife at one point yesterday and she had icycles on her eye brows, so I spose I didn't have it set quite right
I've been suffering only because I just don't want to pay big $$$ for the cool air.  But neither would I like icycles on my eyebrows  haha Enjoy the day.

Morning Lew!  After almost 40 years I still can't get used to this working thing..... I should have been a little smarter with my choice of career! Although you wouldn't know anything about that....lol  Really looking forward to July.  J...
Hey, I tried that work thing for awhile John, but after 4 decades decided it wasn't for me  And your right about July, it's gonna be a good trip, I just hope we can get the boats in the water.
I'll get the boat in even if I have to unhook everything, reverse quickly and slam the brakes on....   Hopefully we will get some rain?????????????

Ahhhhhhhhh, A/C...... I got home Tuesday morning with the kids and got into a nice cool house. The wife had to work Tuesday morning so she came home Monday night and was nice enough to crank up the a/c.
IT was 78F when I left for market at 4 am.  The temp peaked at 95F in the shade at St Jakobs. I still don't have the air in.
wow that was a hot couple of days. Dumb ass me i volunteered to run a asphalt crew for the summer. didn't think that one out did i. However i did make the peterborough news wednesday night.
Muskie are in season down here?
